document.full_text: the los angeles kings slipped into the post-season with a nail-biting 3-2 shootout win over the phoenix coyotes in a playoff decider on wednesday.
document.title: kings reach playoffs after ot cliffhanger
lines_and_colors: the los angeles kings slipped into the post-season with a nail-biting 3-2 shootout win over the phoenix coyotes in a playoff decider on wednesday.
